solution.linktext: Expand your technical knowledge of the functionality within Skype for Business Online, helping you deploy solutions faster.
Using Technical Presales Assistance and partner advisory hours

community.linktext: Get help from the Microsoft Partner Support Community
Read the Partner Technical Services blog
Subscribe to the MPN Partner Support YouTube Channel

level.title: Submit an issue
level.description: Submit your questions/issues and an agent will contact you within 24 business hours to discuss your submission.

level.title: Call a support professional
